generalDescription.type: Classification model by linear discriminant analysis.
generalDescription.objective: To determine if an instance is of a class or not using linear classification based on Linear Discriminant Analysis.
generalDescription.howWork:
Clas-ADLinear is a linear classification method. Clas-ADLinear uses the Linear Discriminant Analisis described by Fisher. Doing so, it computes the covariance matrix, then the weigth vector for linear classification.
As stated in the LDA method, it is asumed the probability density functions to be or not of the class are normally distributed with identical covariances.
This method manage correctly high dimensional feature dimensions. Unknown data induce poorer results. Datasets must be of small size.
